attributes.action: Honour the will of the British people. Keep Brexit British.
attributes.additional_details:
Trump is already circling Westminster to promote his business interests with many MPs excited to "do a deal" before March next year without the British people being consulted. 

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3919310/Are-queue-trade-deal-Donald-Trump-s-stunning-victory-hailed-boost-post-Brexit-Britain.html?
attributes.background: I was deeply concerned to see Mr Trump interfering in our sovereignty by attempting to dictate our Brexit terms. Brexit is British. His revolution aims to make America great again. Not Britain. We must resist being the junior partner in a special relationship.
